text: Greg Knox (born September 10, 1963) is an American football coach. He is the running backs coach and special teams coordinator at the University of Florida. He has been Dan Mullen's running backs coach since 2009, having been hired by Mullen at Mississippi State University. Although Knox was due to follow Mullen to Florida, he served as interim coach of the Mississippi State Bulldogs in their victory at the 2017 TaxSlayer Bowl. ==Head coaching record== ==References== ==External links== * Florida profile * Mississippi State profile Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Auburn Tigers football coaches Category:Florida Gators football coaches Category:Mississippi State Bulldogs football coaches Category:Northeastern State RiverHawks football coaches Category:Northeastern State RiverHawks football players Category:Ole Miss Rebels football coaches Category:Stephen F. title: Greg Knox
